Sentencas: To provide a reliable integration of components within a solid oxide electrolysis cell stack, it is fundamental to evaluate the mechanical properties of the glass-ceramic sealing materials, as well as the stability of the metal-glass-ceramic interface.
Titulo: Shear Performance at Room and High Temperatures of Glass-Ceramic Sealants for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell Technology

Sentencas: In this work, the mechanical behavior of two previously developed glass-ceramic sealants joined to Crofer22APU steel is investigated at room temperature, 650 degrees C, and 850 degrees C under shear load.
Titulo: Shear Performance at Room and High Temperatures of Glass-Ceramic Sealants for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell Technology

Sentencas: The mechanical properties of both the glass-ceramics showed temperature dependence.
Titulo: Shear Performance at Room and High Temperatures of Glass-Ceramic Sealants for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell Technology

Sentencas: The shear strength of Crofer22APU/glass-ceramic/Crofer22APU joints ranged from 14.1 MPa (20 degrees C) to 1.8 MPa (850 degrees C).
Titulo: Shear Performance at Room and High Temperatures of Glass-Ceramic Sealants for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell Technology

Sentencas: The elastic modulus of both glass-ceramics also reduced with temperature.
Titulo: Shear Performance at Room and High Temperatures of Glass-Ceramic Sealants for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell Technology

Sentencas: The volume fraction of the crystalline phases in the glass-ceramics was the key factor for controlling the mechanical properties and fracture, especially above the glass-transition temperature.
Titulo: Shear Performance at Room and High Temperatures of Glass-Ceramic Sealants for Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell Technology
